r.s: Provides a wrapper to the ImageMagick library.
r.d: Imagick is a native php extension to create and modify images using the ImageMagick API. This extension requires ImageMagick version 6.5.3-10+ and PHP 5.6.0+.
r.n: - Fixes: * Imagick::clutImage(...) now respects the images interpolate method. * You can now pass null to ImagickDraw::setStrokeDashArray() to reset the dash array. * Fixed memory leak in ImageKernel * Fixed compiling against PHP 8.4. * Fixed various reflection issues related to incorrect arginfo - Added: * function Imagick::clutImageWithInterpolate(Imagick $lookup_table, int $pixel_interpolate_method): bool {} * Constants Imagick::COMPRESSION_BC5, Imagick::COMPRESSION_BC7, Imagick::COMPRESSION_LERC, Imagick::DIRECTION_TOP_TO_BOTTOM, Imagick::ALPHACHANNEL_OFF_IF_OPAQUE
